title: Keftedes (Greek meatballs)
ingredients: ['250g white bread, sliced and crusts removed', '500g minced pork', '500g beef mince', '1 egg', '2 medium shallots, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '1 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1/2 tablespoon sea salt, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '100g plain flour, for dredging']
